LanguageData.OG_Kroot_Mercenary.label: mercenary kindred
LanguageData.OG_Kroot_Mercenary.description: A broad category describing the styles and practices of many kroot mercenary kindred groups.
LanguageData.OG_Kroot_Tribal.label: tribal kroot
LanguageData.OG_Kroot_Tribal.description: A broad category describing the styles and practices of those kroot kindred groups, that for one reason or another have regressed technologically.
